questions.prompt: Why does the man go to see his professor?
options: To borrow some charts and graphs from her
To ask her to explain some statistical procedures
To talk about a report he is writing
To discuss a grade he got on a paper
questions.correct_answer: To talk about a report he is writing

options: To demonstrate a way of remembering things
To explain why she needs to leave soon

To emphasize the importance of good health
questions.correct_answer: To demonstrate a way of remembering things

questions.prompt: What does the professor offer to do for the man?
options: Help him collect more data in other areas of the state
Submit his research findings for publication
Give him the doctor's telephone number
Review the first version of his report
questions.correct_answer: Review the first version of his report

questions.prompt: Why does the professor say ''I hope you can recognize by my saying that how much you do know about the subject.''
options: To question the length of the paper

questions.prompt: What was the specific focus of the man's research project?
options: Climate variations in the Grand City area
questions.correct_answer: Climate variations in the Grand City area

questions.prompt: What advice does the professor give about explaining the research?
options: Use technical jargon to sound more professional
Explain it as if talking to someone with casual knowledge
Focus only on the statistical analysis
Omit any personal observations from the report
questions.correct_answer: Explain it as if talking to someone with casual knowledge
